amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of Energy, before approving any natural gas exports, to make a public interest determination in consideration of how exports will affect domestic natural gas prices, jobs and manufacturing, and other factors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in part A of House Report 113-492 to require the Secretary of Energy, before approving any natural gas exports, to make a public interest determination in consideration of how exports will affect domestic natural gas prices, jobs and manufacturing, and other factors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
